name: RENDEL Consulting
goal: RENDEL Consulting is a consultancy specialized in providing legal and public affairs advices, shaping strategies with regards to the legislative process at national and European level as well as in representing and advocating the interest of its clients with national and European institutions in the IP, ICT, Digital and Competition fields. RENDEL Consulting has a history of representing the publishing industry and consultants are experts in their fields. The founder is a confirmed and experienced Legal and Public Affairs specialist in the field of Copyright Law, e-commerce, competition law, Artificial Intelligence and many more.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
